title: Tic Tac Toe
description: The primary goal of the project was to learn and improve my skills by focusing on the game logic and following the specifications outlined in the design provided by frontendmentor.io. By working on this challenge, I was able to enhance my understanding of React, TypeScript, and frontend development concepts.

title: Star Wars Info
description: This assignment was part of our advanced React course, where the challenge was to develop an application that offers comprehensive information about the Star Wars universe. The app fetches data from an API and presents it in a visually appealing manner. An essential requirement was to incorporate query parameters and implement search functionality for each category, as well as pagination.

title: Test
description: I feel comfortable following  specifications, but I am also able to develop design concepts when needed.

title: Peeps, The Card Game
description: This was a personal learning project to create a memory card game using the cool illustrations from Open Peeps as the card designs. The project aimed to use React for the frontend development and incorporate Firebase as a simple backend for the user and Highscore management.

title: Find a developer
description: By using Github's API, I created an app where you can search for users along with their associated information. I followed a specification and built the app using React and CSS.

title: Standard Todo
description: As a frontend developer, having a Todo app is standard :) This  is designed by me showcasing  my UI design skills. I developed it using TypeScript and utilized Firebase as the backend for efficient data and user management.
